header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Skiing, kitchens, planning permission, children (adult), university, drinking alcohol, work, LinkedIn, psychometric testing, parties/celebrations, weather, Facebook, telephones, spam telephone calls, punctuation rules, CV’s, email providers, computers, Internet, conspiracy theories, British Armed Forces, Air Cadets, airplanes, helicopters, flying, wars, cars, modified cars, hypochondriac, rugby, sewing, hobbies, Rainbows (Girl Guiding), Christmas, moving house.
header.activity: Chatting with close friends over a bottle of wine
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, requesting, making arrangements
